title: Idaho: A Novella
description: Idaho portrays the loyal bond between two old friends who have journeyed through youth and adulthood together. But when Jacob receives a phone call from Peter, who asks him for help in facing life’s greatest challenge, will their brotherhood bond be strong enough to go the course? Or will they have to face life’s biggest challenge alone? The answer will be found in the mountains of Idaho.  A novella.
author: Philip Allen  Green
